alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:39PM EDT until August 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 539 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arlington to 6 miles northeast of Pelham, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morgan, Albany, Putney, Edison, Arlington, Leary, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Radium Springs, Parksville, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Holt, Acree, Williamsburg, Moye and Pecan City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
